dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tight close-up of a TV screen. We see 'Machchar Makkhi'.

dialogues.speaker: PEON, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Aaya kay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ab?

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Na.

dialogues.speaker: PEON, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Ab?

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Reh na hoya.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peon is standing near a TV antenna, balancing himself on terrace. He rubs tobacco on his palm. Behind him we see e stretch of Balali, a village in Haryana.

dialogues.speaker: PEON
dialogues.text: Ab?

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Reh theek tara ghumaveh na. Peon hurriedly pops in tobacco and rotates the antenna.

dialogues.speaker: PEON
dialogues.text: Ab?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TV screen comes to life. An international wrestling match going on. We see Mahavir Singh, a young man around 25-28 old, looking at the TV from the window. A smile appears o face.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Aa gya.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR 1
dialogues.text: Seoul Olympics ke wrestling arena mein aapka swagat hai, kaafi romanchak mukable ki umeed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peon is holding the antenna, looking down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nichcheh aajau?

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Na. Pakad keh khadiya reh. Peon makes a face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh enters the office, his eyes are glued to th A couple of his colleagues, working, look at him and shak heads in disapproval.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR 1
dialogues.text: Olympics ke 72 kilo category ka yeh final match russia aur america ke pehelwano ke beech..aur dukh ki baat yeh hai ke bharat mein kushti itni lok priy hone ke bawajut olympics mein bharatiya pehelwano ka pradarshan kaafi niraashajanak rah ahai The wrestling match is getting exciting. On the match foo a super appears: Seoul Olympics, 1988. On Mahavir Singh's face a super appears: Balali, Haryana,

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Meddul toh apNe chhore bi la sakey-ain baisaab, par koi badhava de tab na. Match continues.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Na paise na phehsulty, kis tara jeet-thaingey meddul apNe chhore. Harkindar Singh Bullar, a well built man comes and stands to him.

dialogues.speaker: HARKINDAR
dialogues.text: Moo chalaaNey se kusti jeetti jaatti na baisaab, toh aap toh kab kay meddul jeet chuke hottey. Mahavir Singh looks at him carefully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Naya hai kay? Harkinder just nods.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Tabi main sochchun.

dialogues.speaker: HARKINDAR
dialogues.text: Kabhi akhaade main utar keh dekh langot ke pelle hawa tight ho jaavegi. Mahavir Singh gives him a smile.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Aapki lagta-ai kai baar hui hai baisaab... hawa tight.

dialogues.speaker: HARKINDAR
dialogues.text: Akhada hotta na toh teri kar detta.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Akhade ki kay jaroorat hai. Harkindar gets an arrogant smile on his face. Quick shots of tables getting shifted. We see few people in the office raise their heads to see going on. Mahavir Singh and Harkindar are taking off their shirts. More people are gathering around them. Mahavir Singh and Harkindar are rolling up their pants. Two wrestlers are coming face to face for a bout on TV. Mahavir Singh and Harkindar are coming face to face in of

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR 1, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Now the moment we were all waiting for, the stage is all set for the big fight, there is double excitement in the air. Both the wrestlers were walking for the fight.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR 2, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Bilkul sahi kaha aapne tom, ek bahut hee romanchak muquable ki ummeed. Darshakon mein utsaah. aur dono hi pehelwaan aamne saamne. Dekhna hai ki yeh mood kis tarah failta hai. Yeh bani handshake. Refree ki whistle aur yeh match shuru. People look excited. Mahavir Singh and Harkindar lock hands and test each othe Harkindar still has an arrogant smile on his face. Suddenly Mahavir Singh brings him down with great force. travels amidst the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR 1, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: He is down he is down, russia ke pehelwaan ko palak jhapakte hi muh ki khaani padi. Over confidence kabhi kabhi nuksaan deyak saabit ho sakta hai. Mahavir Singh offers his hand to Harkindar and pulls him

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Mann me koi malal reh gaya ho to Ek baar aur kosis kar le. Harkindar is more cautious now. His smile has vaNSAhed. But Mahavir Singh brings him down again, even more forcef People in the office watch it in awe.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR 1
dialogues.text: Now the wrestlers are gearing up for the next round

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR 2
dialogues.text: Haan tom shuru mein yeh migabla jitna asaan lag raha tha yeh utna asaan hai nahi. Dekhte hai aage kya hota hai. Dono hi wrestlers ek doosre ko parakte hue. Shandaar attack, par yeh defence. aur yeh bahot hi behtareen  move, bahot hi shandaar move tha yeh, samajh mein nahi mein nahi aaya kya hua. aur yeh ek aur attack, and its over. Its over. David has become golat and golat has become david here. Well done tom, kisi ko bhi umeed nahi thi ke russia ka pehelwaan itni jaldi chit ho jayega. What a match. This is top class wrestling Mahavir Singh pulls up and apologetic looking Harkindar a people come close to them.

dialogues.speaker: HARKINDAR
dialogues.text: Dum hai tere main, state level champion ko haraaya-ai toone.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Arey Dil chhotta mat kar, national level champion se haara-ai tu. Harkindar is surprised to hear it. Mahavir Singh picks up shirt and walks towards the TV.as he buttons it. As he st and watches the match, a smile appears on his face. kicks in.

dialogues.speaker: COUSIN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Yo-ain maare tauji Mahavir Singh Phogaat... . Barson pelle pehalwanni chhod chuke-ain par pehalwanni ne inhe aaj tak nahi chhodda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Credit titles appear. Dangal Title song Mahavir Singh cycling towards an Akhada. Title track Mahavir engrossed in watching two wrestlers fight it out pit. Langots hanging on clothes line. An akhada wall painted beautifully. Mud in akhada.  Mugdars arranged in an akhada. Desi push ups. Desi sit ups. Wrestlers getting massage done. Wrestlers touching guru's feet. Wrestlers (all ages) putting mud on their bodies and fore Wrestlers fighting it out in akhada. Guru watching them. Bouts continue. Wrestlers drinking milk. Mahavir Singh along with few others, watching a small kid with a bulkier kid at village chaupal. The smaller kid br the bulkier kid down, much to Mahavir Singh's delight. Ma Singh turns to people around him.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Chota wala hi jeetega, yo dekh Siraph boddy baNaanne se koi pehalwaan nahi baN jaatta. idhar aa beta...Pehalwanni jo-ai na... vo khoon main hotti-ai bhaisaab... khoon main. Mahavir Singh takes out a ten rupee note and hands it to winning kid.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Yo le, doodh pe leNa. Jeeta reh. Few more shots of wrestling. Mahavir Singh watching kushti, looking pensive. Cut to flashback:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh, 19 years old, is fighting at National championship.  Mahavir Singh on podium, getting a medal. Mahavir Singh at home. His father is angry with him

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Reh jab thaDi main rotti na hoggi toh meddul khaavega kay? Koi na poochchheh teri iss pehalwanni ko. Jo naukri mil ri-ai, chupchap kar ley. Mahavir Singh sitting sad in his house. Food is kept in f of him. Mahavir Singh takes a bite from his plate. Match cut to present.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh having food with Harkindar.

dialogues.speaker: COLLEAGUE
dialogues.text: Tanneh pehalwanni kyon chhoddi?

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Chhoddi nahi bai, chhodNi padgi. Pehalwanni main sohrat kamaai, ijjat kamaai, bas paise nai kama paaya. Naukri kar lee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh standing, getting scolded by his boss. Boss and Mahavir Singh looks around quietly.

dialogues.speaker: COUSIN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Har pehalwan yo-ii soch keh akhade main utarta-ai kay woh des ke liye kuch karaiga. Par des-ii pehalwan kay liye kuch na kareh toh bichara pehalwan kay karlega.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh is seeing his photographs hanging on the wa a wrestler and his achievements in various places. There gold medal hanging there too. His pregnant wife comes in sees him in a sombre mood. She goes and stand next to him looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: WIFE
dialogues.text: Aap des ke liye meddul nai laa paaye ismeh aapki galti thodai na thi. Kab tak in photuon ko dekh dekh keh dukhi hotte raoge?

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Jo main karNa chahtta tha wohh mahara betta kar keh dikhaavehga. desh ke liye gold jeetega humara beta. Apna tiranga sabse upar lehravega tu dekh lena. He then goes back to looking at his laurels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh is watching a bout. Same little boy comes r and tells him something. Mahavir Singh runs out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh enters the house. His brother is sitting th with his son (3-4 year old Omkar).

dialogues.speaker: COUSIN
dialogues.text: Tauji ki halat uss student jaisi thi jiska board exam ka result aane waala ho.

dialogues.speaker: BROTHER
dialogues.text: Chinta na karo bhaisaab sab thik hojayega A woman comes out of the house. They look at her. Mahavir looks very excited.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chhori hui-ai. Mahavir Singh's smile drops. Brother taps on his shoulder console him.

dialogues.speaker: COUSIN
dialogues.text: Tauji chhore ki ummeed laga keh baiTthe the, aa gi thi chhori. Brother turns to young Omkar.

dialogues.speaker: BROTHER
dialogues.text: BeheN aai-ai teri Omkar Omkar looks happy. He looks at Mahavir Singh. Mahavir Sin tries to smile.

dialogues.speaker: COUSIN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Main bheetar se khus tha. Aur Tauji sirf bhaar se.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A man is whispering something in Mahavir Singh's ears. As finishes Mahavir Singh's eyes sparkle.

dialogues.speaker: COUSIN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Re uske baad kay tha bhai... gyaanniyon ka gyaan tha, tau-taai ka kaan tha, aur har kisi ke paas chhora paidda karNe ka achook plaan tha. A woman is advising Mahavir Singh's wife, as she makes co uplas.

dialogues.speaker: WOMAN
dialogues.text: KaaDi gaiya ko saphed til ke laaddoo baajre ki rotti main lapet keh ulte haath se suraj nikaDne se pehlle khila deNa... Chhora pakka. Mahavir Singh's wife is trying to feed a cow, the cow is in a mood to oblige. An astrologer is telling Mahavir Singh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir ek Putar mantar likh keh de ra-oon, sachche maNn se jaap karte rehnNa. Mahavir Singh takes the paper and touches it to his eyes. Mahavir Singh rotating rudraksh mala while working in off An old man is telling Mahavir Singh at chaupal.

dialogues.speaker: OLD MAN
dialogues.text: Dekh betta Mahavir, kosish keval itwaar/sunday ko karNi-ai, baakki din sayyamm. Ekdum alag alag. Wife is sleeping inside with the daughter. Mahavir Singh is sleeping outside. Mahavir Singh and his wife are at a temple by the tree. P hands him a laddoo. Mahavir asks him in gesture. Pandit g a reassuring smile.

dialogues.speaker: COUSIN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Na logon neh salaah deNi band kari na tau-tai neh maanni.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh is sitting with his 2 year old daughter Gee his lap. His brother and Omkar (now 5-6 years old) are si nearby. All the advisers along with other villagers are a present there.

dialogues.speaker: COUSIN
dialogues.text: Delivery ka din aa chuka tha, aur aaddha gaon bhi... chhora hoNe ka credditt leNe. Brother tells Geeta.

dialogues.speaker: MAN
dialogues.text: Bhai aaNe waaDa hai tera Geetta. khoob khelegi phir  Same mid-wife comes out.

dialogues.speaker: WOMAN
dialogues.text: Chhori hui-ai. Mahavir Singh's face drops. People also look stunned.

dialogues.speaker: COUSIN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Par na tauji ko chhora mila, na gaon waaDon ko credditt. Villagers chat and some start getting up to leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Various men and women are telling where Mahavir Singh and wife have gone wrong in their actions.

dialogues.speaker: COUSIN
dialogues.text: Par in achook samadhaanno main aakhir chook thi kiski? Woman telling others.

dialogues.speaker: WOMAN
dialogues.text: KaaDi gaiy kay dhokke main bhains ko khila di hoggi rotti, warna mahri mausi ki chhori ko dekho Rohtak waDi... teen saal mein teen chhore ho gaye... tandurust. Astrologer telling a handful of people at his place.

dialogues.speaker: ASTROLOGER
dialogues.text: Ab maaDa ulti perehga toh rejult bhi ulta-ii aavehga. Old man telling others at chaupal.

dialogues.speaker: OLD MAN
dialogues.text: Sayyam insaan ki lagaam-ai. Manne toh kaha tha ke koshish sirf itwar ko hi karni hai, isne roj ghoda daudaaya hogga.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh is putting Geeta to sleep. Wife is with Bab

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Main aapko chhora na de paai.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Isemin teri galati thodi na hai -Galat mat samajh munneh. Geetta aur Babitta donno-ii bhot pyaari-ain manneh. Par mera jo sapNa-ai na, wohh siraph chhora-ii poora kar sakeh-ai.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OTS of Mahavir Singh. Geeta (12 yrs), Babita (10 yrs), 3rd daughter (5 yrs) are at the new born baby, lying next to their mother. We see close ups of smiling faces of Geeta and Babita.

dialogues.speaker: COUSIN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Waqt beeta, Tauji ne zid pakad lee thi ki unhe ladka chahiye. We reveal Mahavir Singh (now 42 yrs) from behind one of t girls. He is looking at them.

dialogues.speaker: OMKAR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Par shayad bhagwan ne bhi zid pakad lee thi. Teesri bhi chhori hui aur chauthi bhi. iss baar toh main bhi bheetar se dukhi tha. We see close up of mother looking at the baby. She looks looks at Mahavir Singh who doesn't look too happy. Omkar (now 15 yrs) is standing near Mahavir Singh, lookin him. Wide shot of Mahavir Singh watching all this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh is taking off the photographs from the wal putting them in a box. The wall is almost empty now as mo the photographs have landed in the box. Young Geeta comes to the window of the room.

dialogues.speaker: GEETA
dialogues.text: KhaNa lag gya-ai papa. Mahavir Singh looks at her and nods.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Hmmm . Mahavir Singh then looks at the lone medal hanging on the He takes it off too and puts it in the box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh seems to have resigned to fate. Mahavir Singh having dinner. Geeta and Babita serving him

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH WIFE
dialogues.text: Re palat isse, jal jayegi iss tarah Mahavir Singh is watching Geeta and Babita play hop skip jump, skipping ropes etc.

dialogues.speaker: OMKAR
dialogues.text: Uske baad tauji ne chore ki umeed se aur apne sapne se dono se hi muh mod diya. Mahavir Singh is going to office, now on a scooter, ignor an akhada. A kid calls out for him. He ignores. Someone offering laddoo to Mahavir Singh in village marke

dialogues.speaker: MAN
dialogues.text: Ai Mahavir, chhora hua hai mujhe, laddoo toh khaata ja. Mahavir Singh takes the laddoo with a smile. The man smil at him meaningfully as he looks at Geeta and Babita with Mahavir Singh walks away and the breaks the laddoo into t offers it to Geeta and Babita.  Mahavir Singh is sitting quietly on the terrace. Office. Harkinder (now 40 yrs) gestures Mahavir for a fig he smiles faintly and goes back to work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh comes back home. Wife comes at the door. Sh worried. Mahavir Singh gestures her to ask what happened. gestures back indicating him to come inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh enters and stops on seeing something. Two m up from the cot on seeing him. Two boys, around 13-14 yea are standing next to them, beaten and bruised. Their wive standing behind them with ghoonghats over their faces. Yo daughters are also present there.

dialogues.speaker: WOMAN 1
dialogues.text: Dekkho na bhaisaab kitni buri tara se maara... aap bhi bollo na kuch.

dialogues.speaker: MAN 1
dialogues.text: Haan dekkho na bhaisaab kitni buri tara se maara.

dialogues.speaker: WOMAN 1
dialogues.text: Suja diya-ai maar maar keh.

dialogues.speaker: MAN 1
dialogues.text: Haan, suja diya-ai maar maar keh. Mahavir Singh raises his hand to slap the cousin.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Re kyon maara? Cousin takes a defensive pose but gets slapped. Wife inte

dialogues.speaker: OMKAR
dialogues.text: Maine na mara tau. Mahavir Singh looks at his wife.

dialogues.speaker: WIFE
dialogues.text: Geetta Babitta nain maara-ai. Mahavir Singh is surprised. He looks at Geeta and Babita standing quietly in one corner and then looks back at the boys who are bulkier than them. He then turns back to Gee Babita.

dialogues.speaker: GEETA
dialogues.text: Shuruaat inne kari thi... manneh kutiya keh ra tha, Babitta neh kaminni... hamneh bhi dhar diye do-chaar.

dialogues.speaker: WOMAN 2
dialogues.text: Itni si baat peh koi itna maarta-ai kay bhaisaab?

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Haan... itna toh nai maarNa chahiye tha. Bachchi samajh keh maaph kar do. Men and women walk out with their kids.

dialogues.speaker: MAN 1
dialogues.text: Aapki chhoriyaan-ai isliye chhod diya bhaisaab.

dialogues.speaker: WOMAN 1
dialogues.text: Chal ...choriyon se pitt gaya Mahavir Singh joins his hands as they walk past him. He s on the cot and turns towards Geeta and Babita.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Idhar aao. Geeta and Babita walk towards him, Babita taking shelter Geeta. They have tears in their eyes and look scared.

dialogues.speaker: GEETA
dialogues.text: Aagge se nai maarengey Pappa.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Tch tch, pelleh yo batao maara kaise? Geeta and Babita muster up courage. They start demonstrat their moves keeping cousin brother as the subject.

dialogues.speaker: GEETA
dialogues.text: Usne Munneh kutiya bolo toh main to chup re gi, lekin usne Babitta ko kameenni keh diya... bas manneh lapek ke uske pet pe de dala ghusakar.

dialogues.speaker: BABITA
dialogues.text: Idar se doosra waaDa bhi aa gya. Manneh uske baaD pakad keh nichheh patak diya aur peeT peh kohnni dhar dee. As Geeta and Babita demonstrate their moves on cousin, Ma Singh watches them attentively, with an amused look on hi Music kicks in.

dialogues.speaker: COUSIN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Kehtte-ain doobNe waaDe ko tinke ka sahara kaaphi hota-ai, yaan toh Tauji ko dod-do lipheguard mil gaye the. Mahavir Singh finally smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh is talking to his wife. Younger daughters a sleeping.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Main hamessa yo soch keh rotta raha kay chhora hotta toh des ke liye kusti main gold laatta. Par yo baat meri samaj main na aayi kay gold to gold hotta-ai, chhora laavey ya chhori. Wife just looks at him stunned.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aaj ke baad Geetta aur Babitta na choolla chaukka karaingi na jhaadoo pochcha... inke khoon main pehalwaanni-ai... aaj ke baad yo sirph pehalwanni karengi.  Wife just looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh is bathing by the hand pump while his wife filling the bucket.

dialogues.speaker: WIFE
dialogues.text: Pehalwanni toh siraph chhore karte-ain.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Mahri chhoriyaan chhoron se kam thode na-ain. Mahavir Singh gets up and dries himself. Wife tells herse

dialogues.speaker: WIFE
dialogues.text: Manneh toh na dekha aaj tak chhoriyon ko pehalwanni karte.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wife is making roti, lost in her thoughts. She puts in a on Mahavir Singh's plate.

dialogues.speaker: WIFE
dialogues.text: GaonwaaDe kay bollaingeh?

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Kab tak bollaingeh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wife is awake. Mahavir Singh's eyes are closed.

dialogues.speaker: WIFE
dialogues.text: Choriyo Ke Haath pair toot gay toh?

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Judwa lenge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh is leaving for office. Wife hands him tiffi

dialogues.speaker: WIFE
dialogues.text: Paise kaan se aayenge? Mahavir Singh thinks for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Pata ni.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh is cleaning a Mugdar. Wife comes to the doo

dialogues.speaker: WIFE
dialogues.text: ApNe junoon ke liye chhoriyon ki jindagi barbaad mat karo.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Bas ek saal dedde munneh... Ek saal tak tu apNe kalejje peh paththar rakh le. Agar galat saabbitt ho gya to main jindagi bhar apNe kalejje peh paththar rakh loonga. Wife keeps quiet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh walks up to Geeta and Babita. They are play a board game. They get up on seeing Mahavir Singh.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Kal subah paanch baje taiyaar rehNa.

dialogues.speaker: GEETA
dialogues.text: Kyon pappa?

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Tum donno ko gol-gappe khilaNey-ain. Geeta and Babita smile nervously. Mahavir Singh smiles ba

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Paanch baje... haan? Geeta and Babita nod. Mahavir Singh walks out. Geeta and look at each other and wonder.

dialogues.speaker: GEETA
dialogues.text: Ab kay kar diya tanneh?

dialogues.speaker: BABITA
dialogues.text: Munneh laga aapnneh kuch kara-ai /kara hogga. Both wonder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close-up of two donas with pani puri. Geeta and Babita lo at them. They then look up. There is a pani puri guy stan there. Mahavir Singh is looking at them. Wife is standing nearby.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Khaao. Geeta and Babita pick up the donas and start eating.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kaise-ain?

dialogues.speaker: BABITA
dialogues.text: Teekkha thoda kam-ain pappa.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Haan bhai thoda aur teekkha baNa de. Gol-gappa guy adds spice. Babita likes it.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jitna khaaNa hai abhi kha lo. Geeta and Babita stop eating.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kyonki aaj se tum donno pehalwaano ki jindagi jiyogi. Geeta and Babita are stunned to hear it. They look at th mother. She keeps a straight face.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aur pehalwaano ko gol-gappe, achaar, chooraN, chatpata... jo sab tum donno ko pasand-ai na, woh sab khaaNa mana hai. Geeta and Babita look nervous. Gol-gappa guy offers them gol-gappas.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aaj ke baad na milaingey. Babita extends her hand. While Geeta just looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh starts girls' training.

dialogues.text: Aur lagta hai Bharat ko silver se hi santust rehna padega. Babita is egging Geeta to go for it, teary eyed. We see close up of Geeta's face, concentrating. Mahavir Singh is sitting quietly in the room. Mahavir's voice echoes in Geeta's head.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Saamne waale kay dimag se khelna hai.daav Dikhan kuch hain lagaana kuch. Balali girls look distraught. Clock shows 1:50 Close up of Geeta's face. She is looking for an opportuni Geeta makes her final move. Super slo mo shots, ramped up in between. She foxes the Australian by initially going in the right direction for the attack. Austrlian shifts her body in that direction. Geeta changes her direction mid-way to the left. By the time Australian realizes Geeta's move, Geeta has m behind her and held her by her waist.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Aur ye geeta ka shaandaar move. Kya samay unka saath dega? Clock shows 1:54 Babita gets up from her chair, wide eyed. Geeta puts all her might in lifting the Australian who is resisting. Super slow motion shot of Australian being lifted in air Geeta. Clock shows 1:55 We focus on Geeta's face. She is putting in all her might screaming. Babita has tears in her eyes as she screams. Clock reads 1:58 Geeta brings the Australian down further, much closer to mat.  Clock reads 1:59 Geeta makes the Australian land on her shoulders on the m Clock reads 2:00. Referee's whistle goes off. Geeta slowly looks up. Pin drop silence in the stadium. Referee shows 5 points. Scorecard changes from Geeta 1 - Angelina 5 to Geeta 6 - 5. The whole stadium erupts. Geeta lifts both her hands in air, letting out a loud war Balali house erupts with joy. Sisters hugging each other and mother. Babita has tears in her eyes. Omkar has tears in his eyes. Balali girls are ecstatic. Australian is distraught as she lies on the mat, holding head. Babita runs towards Geeta, hugs her and lifts her. Jubilations.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Its a gold for Geeta.Geeta Kumari Phogat ne wohh kar dikhaya jiski kisi ko bhi ummeed nahi thi. Common Wealth games mein gold jeetne waali wohh pehli bhartiya woman wresltler bann gayi hain. Kisne socha tha ki bharat ke ek chhote se gaav ki ladki, poore vishwa par apni chhaap chhodne ki kaabiliyat rakhti hai. Well done  Geeta. A proud moment for India indeed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh is sitting quiet. Not sure what's happening outside. He can hear faint roar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Geeta almost ignores her coach as she goes up to hug Omka Babita and asking for Mahavir Singh.

dialogues.speaker: OMKAR
dialogues.text: Champion..

dialogues.speaker: GEETA
dialogues.text: Pappa kahan hai.?

dialogues.speaker: OMKAR
dialogues.text: Pta nahin...aaye toh mere saath hi they.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh is sitting quietly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Geeta is getting the gold medal.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR
dialogues.text: Aur ye gold medal, India ki Geeta Kumari Poghat ko. Crowd is jubilant.

dialogues.speaker: COMMENTATOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aur ab jaise ki pratha hai, gold jeetne waale desh ka raashtriya gaan bajega.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh is sitting. He hears India's national anthe stands up. And a realization happens. Suddenly tears well his eyes and he gets a smile on his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone has tears in their eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone has tears in their eyes. Mother, sisters, brothe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: National anthem finishes. Crowd roar is heard again. Maha Singh has tears running down his eyes. Just then the door and a janitor walks in. Mahavir Singh rushes out. Much to janitor's surprise.

dialogues.speaker: JANITOR
dialogues.text: Oye... yahan kya kar raha hai?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh is running. More running.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mahavir Singh enters the stadium. The coach is about to p with Geeta for the press. Just then Geeta sees Mahavir Si enter. She runs towards him, leaving the coach fuming.

dialogues.speaker: COACH
dialogues.text: Aray Geeta...aa jao,aa jao...media wait kar raha hai bhai.come. Aa jao sab khinch lo...... come come come. As Mahavir Singh looks at her with tears in her eyes and on his face, Geeta can't stop crying and smiling. Babita and Omkar join in. Geeta takes out her medal and p it around Mahavir Singh's neck. Mahavir Singh puts it bac around her neck, holds her by her shoulders and looks at with great pride.

dialogues.speaker: OMKAR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Aur pher phinally Tauji kay moo se woh golden sabd nikDa jisseh sunNe kay liye maahray kaan pichchle dus saal se taras gaye the.

dialogues.speaker: MAHAVIR SINGH
dialogues.text: Saabbas!!!
